Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ugh... <clr:0000><sp:5:1:0><clr:ffff>It's all smoky 'cause of that
darned<clr:0000> marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.

Maybe I wouldn't mind so much if I could
enjoy it, but these teeth of mine can't
handle that crunch.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Who'd have thought a Hylian would be the
one to remind me of a place filled with
such precious memories.
So hard to remember things these days.
Someday, you'll understand what I mean.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>You forget the name of the ore you ate
yesterday... You prolly forget your friends'
names too. Even...your family's.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>You forget the name of the ore you ate
in the morning... You prolly forget your
friends' names too. Even...your family's.
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>You forget the name of the ore you had
for dinner... You prolly forget your friends'
names too. Even...your family's.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>You forget the name of the ore you had
for lunch... You prolly forget your friends'
names too. Even...your family's.
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>You forget the name of the ore you
had for a snack... You prolly forget your
friends' names too. Even...your family's.
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If only my teeth were stronger like the
younger Gorons...I'd be gnawing on that
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff> from dusk till dawn.
But anyway...
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>When that time comes, then you'll finally
understand the feelings of someone who's
been around as long as I have.
So make sure you treat everyone with
kindness, y'hear?
